name: Heirloom Tomato & Burrata Salad
description: It’s summer so you know what that means—the glorious season of juicy, sun-kissed tomatoes is upon us! From deep reds to sunny yellows, heirloom tomatoes are like a rainbow on your plate. Now let’s talk burrata. Each ball is a pouch of fresh mozzarella filled with a creamy, velvety centre. Find it in the good cheese section at the grocery store.
preparation: Chop tomatoes into 1" pieces, reserving the juices.
In a large bowl, add tomatoes (including the juices), sauce mix, and olive oil; gently toss to combine.
Place burrata ball in the centre of a serving platter. Arrange salad around it. Drizzle with pesto.
tips: Cut into burrata to mix the creamy cheese with tomatoes right on the platter.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 slices of bread and 4 oz (113 g) lean protein.
